product_name: Repel Family Dry Aerosol Insect Repellent - 10 Percent DEET - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: Repel Family Dry Aerosol insect repellent is easy to apply and provides effective protection from mosquitoes and other biting insects. 10% DEET formula repels mosquitoes. Unscented formula is not oily or greasy.
short_description: Repel Family Dry Aerosol insect repellent is easy to apply and provides effective protection from mosquitoes and other biting insects.
